name: A Hunter's Dilemma
description:
Here I'm testing out my writing skills with a branching narrative story based on the Starfinder universe by Paizo games, creators of Pathfinder. This is meant to give the player diverse choices in how they express themselves, similar to other dialogue based RPGs like Disco Elysium, while also having the agency to affect the outcome of the mission without dice rolls being a factor. 

Cover Image from Archetype Entertainment's website.
